scripts.doc: xdg-open http://localhost:6060; go tool godoc -http localhost:6060
scripts.profile: go build . && ./3d-rack-brackets --cpu-profile=output/render.prof render --production output/output.scad && go tool pprof -http 0.0.0.0:8080 ./3d-rack-brackets ./output/render.prof
scripts.render: mkdir -p output && go run . render output/output.scad
scripts.render:debug: mkdir -p output && go run . --debug render output/output.scad
scripts.render:prod: mkdir -p output && go run . render --production output/output.scad
